summary: Just a simple NPC To make Whiterun more lively. (Rough Early Version, I will update and add more to this mod.)
descriptionHtml:
This is a Mod that started as an inside joke, but I figured the world should enjoy L'sus (Lapostrophesus). This is the rough early version. He only contains one line of dialogue as his voice actor is out of town at the moment. I plan to add a lot more to his character, but for now he is just a bum who will hack and cough at you in and outside of Whiterun. Enjoy!

---
He frequently sits upon the well in the center of Whiterun in the evening, but it's a little akward when he gets down.

Let me know about any other issues to fix. Thanks.
author: Tboneboy
